body.p: Defining which costs are transaction costs is beyond the scope of the Conceptual Framework. They have normally been defined in particular Standards as incremental costs, other than the transaction price, that would not have been incurred if the particular asset (or liability) being measured had not been acquired (incurred) or sold or disposed of (transferred or settled).
